title.rendered: Abrams Casts Ballot in May 24 Primary Election; Releases Video Encouraging Georgians to Vote

content.rendered:
ATLANTA – Today, Abrams for Governor released a new video featuring Stacey Abrams immediately after she cast her ballot in the May 24 primary. Abrams voted early at the Bessie Branham Recreation Center in Atlanta. In the video, Stacey reminds Georgians of the importance of making their voices heard in the May 24 primary:

“I believe in One Georgia — a Georgia that rises together. But I believe every voice matters, whether they vote for me or not. So join me at the polls and make certain you make your voice heard by May 24.”

The full video can be viewed here.

###
